+#![feature(slice_patterns)]
+
+fn slice_pat(x: &[u8]) {
+    // OLD!
+    match x {
+        [a, b..] => {}
+        //~^ ERROR expected an array or slice, found `&[u8]`
+        //~| HELP the semantics of slice patterns changed recently; see issue #23121
+    }
+}
